author: dblevins
msg: Design documentation in generic xml format.

This xml is not exactly how I would like it.  I would prefer that it all be in one xml file and broken up into several html files when translated.  Then we can delete all these design_*.xml documents.
Also, each component shouldn't need to list it's subcomponents and implementations directly, they can be easily discovered in the XSL translation process.
